name: Tim 7: Et Le Milliardaire
storyline: During a plane flight over the island, a billionaire discovers Amnesia. In order to decide if he can stay there on vacation, he asks its inhabitants a series of questions. Opposed to the arrival of a stranger, Gaaf believes Tim 7 incapable of responding. He will prove him wrong by reviewing his knowledge of spelling, conjugation and grammar...
summary:
Tim 7: Et Le Milliardaire is an edutainment game focusing on CM2 level of French.

Contens of the subject:
The components of the sentence: the noun and its determiner, the qualifying adjective and the verb.

Invariable words: adverbs, prepositions, coordinating conjunctions.

Sentence construction: distinction between sentence forms and types; independent, juxtaposed, coordinated propositions; identification of the subject group; verb complements.

Verb groups: the stem of the verb; the difficulties of the present; of the future and the imperfect; simple past and compound past; imperative present.

Spelling: accents; grammatical homophonies; the masculine of adjectives.

You play as Tim 7, named as such due to being kidnapped by Dr. Gaaf and being the 7th guinea pig of his experiments. Tim 7 has lost his memories and you need to help him escape the island.
